description:
Discover the best way to enjoy HD Movies 2025. explore trailers of new and trending movies

Looking for the latest in free streaming and movie trailers? We’ve got you covered with daily updates, smooth navigation every new release.

Key Features:

- Watch HD movie trailers anytime
- Discover new releases and upcoming hits
- Fast and easy to use – no sign-in required
- Get alerts for the latest movie trailers

This app is designed for true movie lovers who want quick access to trailers and updates without any hassle. Perfect for staying up to date with new movies and blockbusters in one place.

Pribacy policy:

https://peterjosephapps.blogspot.com/2025/08/privacy-policy.html

Terms:
https://peterjosephapps.blogspot.com/2025/08/terms.html

- Discover Now Playing / Popular / Top / Trending / Upcoming / Best Of Years Movies & TV Shows
- Quick search for movies and TV series by title
- Watch trailers and other videos
- Create your own watchlists for movies
- TV series calendar
- Detailed information about movies and TV series
- Rate Movies/TV shows in app and explore other rating
- Complete list of episodes for TV series with complete information about the episodes
- Search for services where you can buy, rent, stream films and series
- Watch videos (HD fullsreen) about movies and TV shows without leaving the app
- Profiles of actors with their full filmography
- Simple and user-friendly application interface
- Browsing history
- No account required

Disclaimer: 
In the application, you cannot watch films and series for free, but you can find in the application a complete description of the series and films and also the service on which you can watch them.

All movies information and images are from TMDB.org licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/

This app uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb: https://www.themoviedb.org/documentation/api/terms-of-use

Introducing Match Score, the essential app for every football enthusiast. With Match Score, you can stay effortlessly connected to the world of football, accessing a wealth of information right at your fingertips. From match schedules to results, Match Score ensures you're always in the loop.

Key Features:


Upcoming Matches & Results:
Never miss a game again! Match Score provides a comprehensive schedule of all upcoming matches, allowing you to plan your viewing in advance. Additionally, you can easily check the results of past matches, keeping you up to date with the latest developments in the football world.

Favorites:
Track your favorite teams and matches with ease. Match Score's Favorites feature lets you select the teams and matches that matter most to you. Receive real-time notifications when these matches are about to start, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action.

Predictions:
Enhance your game-day experience with expert insights and predictions. Match Score offers detailed analysis and predictions for today's matches, helping you stay informed and engaged. Whether you're a casual fan or a seasoned follower, these predictions add an extra layer of excitement to your football experience.

Stay effortlessly connected to the football world with Match Score. Download the app today and make it your go-to source for all football updates and information.

With this app, everything Le Monde has to offer is in one place. 
- Keep up with the news via our homepage, curated by Le Monde in English journalists.
- All of “Le Monde in English” articles: reports, investigations, opinion pieces, and more.
- Our videos, photos, and infographics.

We’ve included a number of features to enhance your reading experience.
- Switch to dark mode or change your font to personalize your reading experience.
- Save the articles you want to read later.
- Pick your own sections to see the news that interests you.

Le Monde in English delivers in-depth and reliable news coverage on a wide-range of topics:
- News from France, Europe and the world.
- The latest news across our many sections: Environment, Business, Politics, Investigations, and more.
- Along with coverage on sports, technology, science, culture, and the arts.

When you subscribe to Le Monde in English, you are supporting an independent newsroom of over 530 journalists, and benefitting from unlimited access to Le Monde in English content, on the website and the app.

If you have any questions or encounter a technical issue, take a look at our FAQ to see if your question has already been answered, or reach out to our support team via “Report a problem” in the app settings.

General terms and conditions: https://moncompte.lemonde.fr/cgv-en

Understand more, faster. Particle removes the work of keeping up with what's happening by bringing everything you need to know into one place. 

PERSONALIZED NEWS
Keep up with the topics that matter most to you.

FOLLOW ANYTHING
Follow people, places, and things to always get news about them right in your feed. Follow journalists and publishers to always see content from them, too. Want it even faster? When something you follow is making news, you can choose to get notified right away.

SUMMARIZED, YOUR WAY
Read the news in succinct, summarized bullet points that tell you what you need to know. Choose from different summary styles, like "Explain Like I'm 5", "The 5Ws", or even a different language—to help you understand the story in the best way for you. Summaries let you quickly decide if you want to know more, and then you can dive deeper by tapping on the source articles, relevant links, and more. 

MULTI-PERSPECTIVE
Particle brings you news from many sources and provides multiple perspectives into one place. See the different sides of a story with the "Opposite Sides" summary style, and understand how a story is being covered with Particle's political spectrum chart.

INTERACTIVE
Need to learn more? Ask a question about any story, and Particle will answer it for you. Browse questions to learn from what others have asked.

LISTEN TO THE NEWS
Hit "Play" to listen to your personalized feed of news—perfect for your commute or being hands-free!

DAILY DIGESTS
Get push notifications for your top news every day.

Relax and dive into a great story! Enjoy our bestselling series! Millions of readers can’t get enough of our library of unputdownable novels. Dive into an extensive collection of audiobooks, ebook novels, and immersive fiction stories. New chapters and interactive stories are added every day.

STORIES IN BOTH BOOK/AUDIOBOOK FORMATS

BOOK CLUB

DARK MODE / NIGHT READING

HELP SUPPORT INDEPENDENT WRITERS

LANGUAGES

The immersive reading app Galatea was developed by Inkitt (Free Novels Inc.)

Pilot is Britain's best-selling general aviation magazine. Whether you are an aeroplane enthusiast, already a pilot or thinking of becoming one, it's a great read.  Each issue is packed with flight tests, travel articles, news, technique features and much more to inspire, inform and entertain, including stunning photographs.

The Pilot magazine app features…
• Preview Editions – Read the first 10 pages of any edition before purchasing.
• Huge Archive of Back Issues – Subscribe and receive full access to the latest 100 issues for the duration of your subscription.
• New Search Functionality – Quickly and easily search for articles that interest you.

----------------------------------------------

This is a free app download. Within the app users can purchase the current issue and back issues.

Subscriptions are also available within the application. A subscription will start from the latest regular issue at the time of purchase.

-The subscription will renew automatically unless cancelled more than 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, for the same duration and at the current subscription rate for the product.
-You may turn off the auto-renewal of subscriptions through your Account Settings, however you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period.
-Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when a subscription to that publication is purchased.
-If a subscription offers a free trial, at the end of the trial period, you will be charged the full price of the subscription. You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription settings on your iTunes account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the subscription period to avoid being charged.

Users can register for/ login to a pocketmags account in-app. This will protect their issues in the case of a lost device and allow browsing of purchases on multiple platforms. Existing pocketmags users can retrieve their purchases by logging into their account.

We recommend loading the app for the first time in a wi-fi area so that all issue data is retrieved.
If your app will not load past the splash page after a first install or an update, please delete and reinstall the app from the App Store

Help and frequently asked questions can be accessed in-app and on pocketmags.

If you have any problems at all please do not hesitate to contact us: help@pocketmags.com

--------------------

You can find our privacy policy here:
http://www.pocketmags.com/privacy.aspx

You can find our terms and conditions here:
http://www.pocketmags.com/terms.aspx

description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

Mensuel indépendant, Philosophie magazine offre un éclairage philosophique de l'actualité dans toutes ses dimensions (société, sciences, politique, arts…), une réflexion sur les grandes questions de l'existence, et un accès à l'oeuvre des philosophes, de l'Antiquité aux contemporains. 

Il s'adresse à tous les lecteurs, à ceux qui sont n'ont que de très vagues souvenirs du cours de terminale, comme aux amoureux de la philosophie. Il cultive l'éclectisme des sujets, la variété des formats (enquêtes, débats, entretiens, chroniques, recensions de livres, BD….), mais aussi la profondeur. Chaque numéro comprend deux grands dossiers, l'un sur un thème contemporain, l'autre sur un philosophe, dont un texte majeur est présenté dans un cahier séparé. 

Lancé en 2006, Philosophie magazine a été élu "meilleur nouveau magazine" en 2007 et "magazine de l'année" en 2010 (prix du Syndicat de la Presse Magazine). 

# Abonnements

Vous pouvez vous abonner au mensuel depuis l'application pour 1 an (10 numéros). Cet abonnement n'inclut pas les hors-séries.

L'abonnement d'un an est reconduit automatiquement sauf si vous désactivez cette option au moins 24h avant la fin de la période en cours. L'abonnement et son renouvellement peuvent être gérés à partir de votre compte dans l'App Store.

Déjà abonné à la version numérique de Philosophie magazine ?
Pour en bénéficier sur votre iPhone ou votre iPad, insérez votre numéro d'abonné à l'aide du menu « code ou numéro d'abonné ».

--
• Mentions légales : https://www.philomag.com/mentions-legales
• Conditions générales : https://abo.philomag.com/cgv
• Politique de protection des données : https://www.philomag.com/confidentialite-et-protection-de-vos-donnees-personnelles

The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself. Rather, I’ll comment that their app is well-designed and refreshing to use…I love being able to easily download entire editions, listen to articles with real narrators and search for past articles.”

Full terms of use: https://www.economist.com/legal/terms-of-use
Our privacy policy: https://www.economist.com/privacy

While most people realize that personality development is a positive step in improving one’s life, some people may have difficulty in finding ways to accomplish it. This is where a personality development plan is important. Our monthly magazine The Personality Development will help you map out areas in which improvement is desired or necessary. A personality development plan will also outline short and long term goals that are realistic. It will also identify the means to accomplish the changes that you want to make in your life. Finally a personality development plan will document the steps you make on the way so you can continually evaluate the progress that is made.

The magazine focuses on a personal development plan starts out with identifying the areas in which you want to improve. It helps you start out by making a list of the areas in your life where you have difficulty. Then, order those areas so that you have the issue that is most pressing or needs the most improvement so you can work on that first. It is not necessary to use a personality development plan as a way to fix everything in your life all at once. Instead, you can concentrate on one item at a time. This is a more manageable way to affect change in your life and you will be able to see the results more quickly. The Personality Development magazine thus helps you achieve whatever you want by way means of identifying the weakest areas in yourself and improving it to bring out the real you within YOU!
==================================
The magazine offers a yearly ($23.99) auto-renewable subscription 
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase 
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period 
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase

The New Yorker app is your digital destination for in-depth reporting, political and cultural commentary, fiction, and humor from New Yorker staff writers and contributors around the world.

Stay up to date. 
Read or listen to top stories from your favorite writers, every day. Turn on notifications so you never miss an important story or your favorite topic. 

Be transported.
News and politics. Books and culture. Fiction and poetry. Discover rich storytelling and rigorous reporting that will sweep you away and introduce you to something new. 

Go about your day.
When your hands are full, listen to featured stories read by world-class narrators. If you need a break, solve a crossword puzzle or Name Drop quiz, and flip through a nearly endless supply of cartoons. And, when you’re on the go, save stories to access them on any device, even offline.

The app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited access. Most current New Yorker subscribers have unlimited access to the app as part of their existing subscription. Subscribers with a print-only subscription may not have unlimited access. App subscribers have full access to the Web site, including the archive and most recent issue. Users who have trouble accessing stories can e-mail apps@newyorker.com for assistance. 

Non-subscribers may access the app by starting a free trial. A subscription costs $11.99 a month or $119.99 annually, and includes a 7-day free trial, after which it will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and will state the cost of renewal. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by updating the user’s App Store Subscription settings after purchase. Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

Information about our Terms of Service & Privacy Policy can be found at http://www.condenast.com/privacy-policy.

A PLAY Games é uma publicação mensal que concentra - há mais de dez anos - as maiores novidades, lançamentos, análises, dicas e curiosidades deste segmento. Sua especialidade são detonados, roteiros completos e minuciosos dos jogos mais populares da geração PlayStation.

Faça o download grátis da PLAY Games e compre edições avulsas ou assine diretamente do seu iPad, iPhone ou iPod Touch. 

• Assinatura auto-renovável PlayStation - Revista Oficial 

• Duração da assinatura e quantidade de edições enviadas durante a assinatura: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano (1 year subscription) – 12 edições 
• Assinatura de 6 meses (6 months subscription) – 6 edições 
• Assinatura de 1 mês (1 month subscription) – 1 edição 

• Preço da assinatura auto-renovável e edições avulsas: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano - Preço: US$ 30.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 6 meses - Preço: US$ 15.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 1 mês - Preço: US$ 2.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Edição avulsa – Preço: US$ 2.99 

• O pagamento será debitado da sua conta do iTunes no momento da confirmação da compra 

• A assinatura é renovada automaticamente a menos que a renovação automática seja cancelada pelo menos 24 horas antes do final do período vigente 

• A renovação da sua assinatura será cobrada no prazo de 24 horas antes do final do período vigente e identificada o custo da renovação 

• As assinaturas podem ser gerenciados pelo usuário e a auto-renovação pode ser cancelada. Isso pode ser feito nas configurações da conta do usuário após a compra 

• Nenhum cancelamento da assinatura atual é permitida durante o período de assinatura vigente 

• Por favor, encontre nossos Termos e Condições e Política de Privacidade em: http://www.europanet.com.br/privacidade/ios/

Qualquer dúvida, entre em contato com a nosso suporte técnico pelo e-mail: suportedigital@europanet.com.br

Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

Discover the YouScribe App
With the YouScribe app, you can explore a vibrant library of audiobooks, eBooks, comics, podcasts, and more! Choose your favorite titles, build personalized reading lists, and stream thousands of works on your phone, tablet, or laptop. You can even enjoy your library offline—anytime, anywhere.

Why You’ll Love YouScribe

A dynamic library to match your interests
- A unique catalogue spanning over 120 themes: novels and short stories, sci-fi, romance, thrillers, personal development, professional resources, and much more.
- Learn and level up with lessons, theses, research papers, essays, and technical or professional documents.
- Smart recommendations to help you discover local and international hits tailored to your taste.
- Multi-format reading—seamlessly switch between text and audio on mobile, tablet, or computer.

Your portable, personalized library
- Offline mode: download and read anywhere, even without an internet connection.
- Automatic sync: pick up right where you left off, on any device.
- Reading comfort: dark mode, adjustable fonts, bookmarks, sleep timer, and more.
- Advanced search: find exactly what you’re looking for in seconds.
- Customized collections: create your own themed shelves and reading lists.
- Community connection: follow your favorite authors and their new releases.
- Personalized experience: receive tailored notifications about new content and features.

How It Works
YouScribe is available in more than 25 countries and offers a constantly expanding catalogue of local and international titles in over 11 languages.
Your subscription gives you unlimited access to our regularly updated library of audiobooks, eBooks, comics, newspapers, and more.
Subscriptions made through the app are billed to your Apple account and renew automatically at the end of each period, unless you turn off auto-renewal in your Apple account settings at least 24 hours before renewal.
If a free trial is available, you’ll need to provide a payment method when signing up—but don’t worry! You won’t be charged if you cancel before the trial ends.
The catalogue, languages, and subscription options may vary by region. Some titles or offers mentioned here may not be available in your country or plan.

Our Commitments
For the price of a single book, enjoy unlimited access to our entire catalogue—and cancel anytime.
We partner with publishers, authors, and creators around the world to bring you a living library that reflects you and your world.
Whether you love reading at night, listening during your commute, or taking a break in the middle of the day—YouScribe is there for you, wherever and whenever inspiration strikes.

SOYEZ ALERTÉS, POUR TOUT SAVOIR EN TEMPS RÉEL



Politique, Économie, International, Culture, Science, Santé, Espionnage… ne ratez rien. Profitez de toute l’actu en continu. Accédez à tout ce qui vous intéresse. Vivez un journalisme indépendant, à chaque instant.


PROFITEZ D’UNE NOUVELLE LECTURE DU MONDE


Nous avons repensé notre app pour une expérience plus confortable.
- Accédez aux articles et à toute l’info, même sans connexion grâce au mode hors-ligne
- Personnalisez vos newsletters pour une information exclusive, qui vous ressemble.
- Sauvegardez vos articles avec la fonctionnalité “Ajout aux favoris”.
- Écoutez vos articles pour le plaisir de découvrir l’actualité librement.



TRANSFORMEZ VOTRE LECTURE EN AVENTURE !


Redécouvrez le savoir grâce à une expérience ludique.

- Pronostics : Tous les jours, une question en lien avec l’actualité. Saurez-vous viser juste ?
- Les 7 menteurs : saurez-vous les démasquer ? Chaque jour, une question de culture générale. 
- Le bon nombre : saurez-vous le deviner ? Retrouvez directement dans nos articles des questions sur le thème de votre lecture.


Explorez l’information, cumulez des points et remportez des récompenses. 
Les meilleurs d’entre vous auront peut-être la chance de gagner une rencontre à la rédaction !


TOUS LES JOURS, VOUS AVEZ RENDEZ-VOUS AVEC NOUS



Impertinents, nos éditorialistes à la plume acérée vous éclairent sur les grands sujets de notre époque. Sans langue de bois, ils vous convient à la réflexion et à la liberté d’esprit, 
en osant le pas de côté.



EXPLOREZ NOTRE ÉPOQUE SANS COMPROMIS


Entre interviews privilégiées et grandes enquêtes, plongez au cœur du savoir. Une autre lecture du monde s’ouvre à vous, fiable, audacieuse, exigeante et indépendante. Notre marque de fabrique : aller voir par nous-même.



REJOIGNEZ LES ESPRITS LIBRES



Sur tous les fronts, nos journalistes vont là où l’Histoire se construit. Passionnés, ils vous racontent notre époque en encourageant le doute et la curiosité. Plus qu’un journal, Le Point vous invite à la contre-pensée, et au plaisir de savoir.



ABONNEZ-VOUS AU POINT


Abonnez-vous à l’offre d’info 100% numérique directement depuis l’app et bénéficiez de 14 jours d’essai offerts !

Profitez pleinement des services inclus dans votre abonnement : 
-Accédez en illimité à l’ensemble des contenus, gratuits et payants de l’appli et du site web, avec votre compte.

-Commentez la presse et débattez de l’info avec les autres lecteurs du Point. 

- Offre mensuelle : 11,99€ par mois
- Offre annuelle : 119,99€ (soit 2 mois offerts)



À l’issue de la période d’essai, l’abonnement au journal prend effet automatiquement. 
Le montant est débité à la confirmation. Il est automatiquement reconduit sauf si cette option est désactivée dans les 24 heures précédant la fin de la période en cours. L’abonnement et son renouvellement automatique peuvent être gérés à tout moment et en toute simplicité en vous rendant sur votre compte dans l’App Store après l’achat.
